item.title: Fiber Optic Networks Need Denser Wavelength Multiplexing To Meet Demand
item.description: Despite the economic downturn, fiber optic network providers are experiencing a surge in demand. However, instead of widespread digging, they are leveraging technology to boost capacity on existing infrastructure. XO Communications, a leading fiber optic network provider, recently revealed plans to double its capacity per fiber strand using Infinera’s optical line equipment. The Infinera Line System 2 increases the channel count for C-band fiber optic systems from 80 to 160, resulting in an extra 1.
